job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtwho we areltbrgtltbrgtltstronggthungryroot is your personal grocer powered by ai and the belief that food deeply impacts your daily life you tell us a little about yourself and we use proprietary predictive technology to deliver groceries and recipes that best suit your individual needs and goals we also assist with meal planning and nutritional support helping you save time save money shop sustainably and eat what makes you feel your bestltbrgtltbrgtwe are a distributed team built on top talent from over states across the us while we have an office in nyc we support employees creating offices wherever they are we believe in fostering team connection and collaboration across all of our offices so dont expect to be online at am to make a meeting if youre on the west coast expect to attend regular team building events and to be able to work from the beach every once in a while expect to be treated like an owner who cares about our common goal not someone who has to clock in and out of workltbrgtltbrgthungryroot is on track to earn m in revenue this year profitable and rapidly growing this is why we need youltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwhat youll doltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwere looking for a highly motivated problemsolving software engineer who is excited to play an integral role in our rapidly growing technology team at hungryroot we experiment iterate learn and repeat most importantly we build things people love as a member of the technology team you will be responsible for the development of the companys customerfacing site including various integrations with our vendorspartners as well as various internal tools necessary for our operations the ideal candidate is obsessed with delivering the best possible customer experience diligent and persistent with assigned tasks and is willing to learn quickly to constantly better oneselfltbrgtltbrgtltstronggthow youll make an impactltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtevaluate design and implement new features to provide the best user experience for our customersltligtltligtbuild improve and maintain our responsive ecommerce web appltligtltligtdevelop scalable backend services in key focus areas such as logistics payments and inventory managementltligtltligtintegrate our frontend and backend with thirdparty vendors for essential operational servicesltligtltligtlisten to the needs of our internal teams and build tools that help solve complex operational workflowsltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggt why we need you ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt years of professional programming experience working on commercial applicationsltligtltligtexperience using python for backend projectsltligtltligtexperience with a web framework such as django preferred flask or rails is a plusltligtltligtexperience in frontend web development with html css javascriptltligtltligtexperience of a frontend framework such as react preferred angular or vue is a plusltligtltligtmotivated and resourceful able to take ownership of your tasks and seeing features through from start to finishltligtltligta bachelors degree in computer science is preferredltligtltligtalways motivated and resourceful able to take ownership of your tasks and see features through from start to finishltligtltligtcollaborate well with teammates and be positive and constructive in communicationltligtltligtbe proactive think slightly ahead instead of remaining reactive to foreseeable problemsltligtltligtstrive to be transparent and candid do not intentionally hide mistakes or blame others instead find ways to prevent future mistakesltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtperks ampamp benefitsltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtremote work optional work from home work from our nyc office work from anywhere you decideltligtltligtcompetitive compensation comprehensive medical dental and vision benefitsltligtltligtunlimited vacation policyltligtltligtmonthly hungryroot creditltligtltligtuniversal paid parental leaveltligtltligtkltligtltligtcommuter benefits ltligtltligta working environment filled with passionate happy smart
